tool.name: SRST2
tool.description: Short Read Sequence Typing for Bacterial Pathogens.

NODE.name: srst2
NODE.description: Short Read Sequence Typing for Bacterial Pathogens

ITEM.name: version
ITEM.description: Show program's version number and exit.

ITEM.name: merge
ITEM.description: Switch on if all the input read sets belong to a single sample, and you want to merge their data to get a single result.

ITEM.name: forward
ITEM.description: Designator for forward reads (only used if NOT in MiSeq format sample_S1_L001_R1_001.fastq.gz; otherwise expect forward reads as sample_1.fastq.gz).

ITEM.name: reverse
ITEM.description: Designator for reverse reads (only used if NOT in MiSeq format sample_S1_L001_R2_001.fastq.gz; otherwise expect reverse reads as sample_2.fastq.gz).

ITEM.name: read_type
ITEM.description: Read file type (for bowtie2; default is q=fastq; other options: qseq=solexa, f=fasta).

ITEM.name: mlst_delimiter
ITEM.description: Character(s) separating gene name from allele number in MLST database (default _, as in arcc_1).

ITEM.name: max_mismatch
ITEM.description: Maximum number of mismatches per read for MLST allele calling (default 10).

ITEM.name: no_gene_details
ITEM.description: Switch OFF verbose reporting of gene typing.

ITEM.name: gene_max_mismatch
ITEM.description: Maximum number of mismatches per read for gene detection and allele calling (default 10).

ITEM.name: min_coverage
ITEM.description: Minimum %coverage cutoff for gene reporting (default 90).

ITEM.name: max_divergence
ITEM.description: Maximum %divergence cutoff for gene reporting (default 10).

ITEM.name: min_depth
ITEM.description: Minimum mean depth to flag as dubious allele call (default 5).

ITEM.name: min_edge_depth
ITEM.description: Minimum edge depth to flag as dubious allele call (default: 2).

ITEM.name: prob_err
ITEM.description: Probability of sequencing error (default 0.01).

ITEM.name: truncation_score_tolerance
ITEM.description: % increase in score allowed to choose non-truncated allele

ITEM.name: stop_after
ITEM.description: Stop mapping after this number of reads have been mapped.

ITEM.name: other
ITEM.description: Other arguments to pass to bowtie2 (must be escaped, e.g. \--no-mixed).

ITEM.name: max_unaligned_overlap
ITEM.description: Read discarded from alignment if either of its ends has unaligned overlap with the reference that is longer than this value (default 10).

ITEM.name: mapq
ITEM.description: Samtools -q parameter (default 1).

ITEM.name: baseq
ITEM.description: Samtools -Q parameter (default 20).

ITEM.name: samtools_args
ITEM.description: Other arguments to pass to samtools mpileup (must be escaped, e.g. \-A).

ITEM.name: save_scores
ITEM.description: Switch ON verbose reporting of all scores.

ITEM.name: report_new_consensus
ITEM.description: If a matching alleles is not found, report the consensus allele. Note, only SNP differences are considered, not indels.

ITEM.name: report_all_consensus
ITEM.description: Report the consensus allele for the most likely allele. Note, only SNP differences are considered, not indels.

ITEM.name: keep_alignments
ITEM.description: Keep interim files (sam and unsorted bam).

ITEM.name: threads
ITEM.description: Use multiple threads in Bowtie and Samtools.

ITEMLIST.name: input_se
ITEMLIST.description: Single end read file(s) for analysing (may be gzipped).

ITEMLIST.name: input_pe
ITEMLIST.description: Paired end read file(s) for analysing (may be gzipped).

ITEM.name: mlst_db
ITEM.description: Fasta file of MLST alleles (optional).

ITEM.name: mlst_def
ITEM.description: ST definitions for MLST scheme (required if mlst_db supplied and you want to calculate STs)

ITEM.name: gene_db
ITEM.description: Fasta file/s for gene databases (optional).

ITEM.name: output
ITEM.description: Prefix for srst2 output files.
